About Me

Here out a few things...

BIO

A versatile, result oriented and passion-driven fullstack Software Engineer, who uses tools like Java, Spring, PHP, Laravel, React and JavaScript and some other web development tools to build amazing software solutions. I have developed a system that yielded over 80% positive user experience feedback. I am seeking to be part of an intelligent, creative and elegant team that is focused on achieving the goals of an enterprise company, in order to solve human daily problems.

Online Shopping Mall

(Java, Spring MVC, JSP, MySQL)

I Developed an Online Shopping System An Application that model online store for purchasing of goods.

Financial Tracker

(Java, Spring Framework , React, MySQl, Junit, Swagger)

Developed a Fintrack System A generic application that monitor financial operations in an organization.

Automart

(Python, Jinja, Flask, SQL)

Modeled an Automart Application for online automobile transactions.

Fashioned Product management System
